QuestData.Title: Dark Memento
QuestData.Description: The flowers were... a nice gesture.$b$b<Velonara sniffs one of the black roses.>$b$bI have a spare hood. Nothing fancy, but perhaps Moorgoth would like to have it.$b$bJust don't let him get his hopes up or anything. I'm merely repaying a kindness.$b$bI would appreciate it if you kept all this between us. Giving presents to admirers falls a bit outside the dark ranger rules of conduct.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Velonara's spare hood to Death Hunter Moorgoth.
